src_text: Xiyimo xa Khabinete eka Timhakakulu1.
trg_text: Issues in the environment1.

src_text: Matshalatshala ya nhlakarhelo na ku aka hi vuntshwa endzhaku ka mikhukhulo
trg_text: Recovery and rebuilding efforts after the floods

src_text: Khabinete yi hundzise vundhundhuzeri bya yona na ku khensiwa ka vanhu hinkwavo na mihlangano leyi khumbekaka eka matshalatshala ya nhlakarhelo na ku aka hi vuntshwa endzhaku ka mikhukhulo leyo onhetela leya ha ku vaka kona eka swiphemu swin'wana swa tiko, ngopfungopfu eKwaZulu-Nata Yi khense mihlangano leyi nga riki ya mfumo hinkwayo, mihlangano ya ripfumelo, miganga, van'wamabindzu na mihlangano ya mphalalo leyi yi nyikeke swakudya, swiambalo, tipheke ta xindzhuti na tiyunifomo ta xikolo eka mindyangu leyi nga sirhelelekangiki ku fikelela swidingo swa yona swa masungul
trg_text: Cabinet expressed its praise and appreciation to all people and organisations involved in recovery and rebuilding efforts following the recent devastating floods in some parts of the country, especially in KwaZulu-Nata It thanked all non-governmental organisations, faith-based organisations, communities, business people and relief organisations that have provided food, clothes, blankets, dignity packs and school uniforms to vulnerable families to meet their basic need

src_text: Senthara ya Malawulelo ya Timhangu ya Rixaka yi ya emahlweni yi hlanganisa swiyenge hinkwaswo swa mfumo eka matshalatshala ya yona ku nyika mphalalo wa nhlayiseko wa vanhu eka miti leyi hlaseriweke hinkway Vukorhokeri bya vutumbelo byi le ku nyikiweni eka kutlula 7 000 ya vanhu eka mune wa swifundzatsongo leswi hlaseriweke kutlula mpimo eKwaZulu-Nata
trg_text: The National Disaster Management Centre continues to coordinate all spheres of government in its efforts to provide humanitarian relief to all affected household Sheltering services are being provided to over 7 000 people in the four worst affected districts in KwaZulu-Nata

src_text: Ntirho wu sungurile hi mayelana na ku aka vutshamo bya nkarhinyana bya mindyangu leyi hlaseriweke eka maphasele ya misava lama nga ehansi ka vun'wini bya mfumo lama ma kumekeke eKwaZulu-Natal leswaku ku va na matshamiselo hi vuntshwa lama nga kotekak Khabinete yi tiyisise vutiboheleri bya mfumo ku lawula timali ta mphalalo wa mfumo hi ndlela ya
trg_text: Work has started on building temporary residences for affected families on state-owned land parcels that have been identified in KwaZulu-Natal for possible resettlemen Cabinet affirmed government s commitment to managing the flood relief funds prudently and transparentl The Auditor-General of South Africa is providing an additional monitoring service and the reprioritisation of funds is in line with the government s budgeting syste 2.

src_text: vurhonwana na ya nkavuciv Oditara-Jenerala wa Afrika-Dzonga u le ku nyikeni ka vukorhokeri bya vuvekatihlo byo ngetela naswona ku endliwa ka swirhangana hi vuntshwa swa timali swi fambisana na sisiteme ya mapimanyetelo ya mfum 2.
trg_text: Cabinet urged all people in South Africa to take precautionary measures to prevent the spread of COVID-19 after latest statistics showed a marked increase in the rate of infections and illnesses associated with the winter season in the countr

src_text: Vuxokoxoko byintshwa hi mayelana na Vuvabyi bya Khoronavhayirasi (COVID-19)
trg_text: Update on the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)

src_text: Khabinete yi hlohlotele vanhu hinkwavo eAfrika-Dzonga ku teka magoza yo sirhelela ku sivela ku hangalaka ka COVID-19 endzhaku ka tinhlayonhlayo ta sweswinyana leti kombeke ntlakuko wo tivikana eka mpimo wa mitluletavuvabyi na mavabyi lama fambelanisiwaka na nguva ya vuxika etikwen
trg_text: The youth programme for the whole of June includes various activities ranging from launching the young trailblazers campaign, launching the NYDA Brand Ambassador Programme and a number of National Youth Service activations across the countr

src_text: Khabinete yi tsundzuxe munhu un'wana na un'wana ku ya emahlweni hi tisirhelela hina vini na vanhu van'wana hi ku hlamba swandla kumbe ku sanithayiza swandla swa hina nkarhi na nkarhi, ku ambala masiki loko hi ri endzeni ka miako, ku siya mpfhuka exikarhi ka vanhu lowu hlayisekeke, ku pfula mafasitere leswaku ku va na nkhuluko wa moya na ku sawutisiw
trg_text: Cabinet reminded everyone to continue safeguarding ourselves and other people by washing or sanitising our hands regularly, wearing a mask when indoors, maintaining a safe social distance, opening windows for ventilation and vaccinatin

src_text: Nsawutiso wu tshama wa ha ri vusirheleri bya kahle swinene ehenhla ka COVID-19 tanihileswi swi sivelaka vuvabyi byo tikisa, ku amukeriwa exibedhlele na hambi rif A wu dingi adirese ya le kaya ku sawutisiw Munhu wihi kumbe wihi, loyi a nga na pasi kumbe loyi a nga hava, a nga sawutisiwa mahala eka tindhawu ta nsawutiso ta mani na mani hinkwato etikweni hinkwaro
trg_text: Vaccination remains the best defence against COVID-19 as it prevents severe illness, hospitalisation and even deat You do not need a home address to vaccinat Any person, with or without an identity document, can get vaccinated for free at all public vaccination sites across the country

src_text: Yima xihlawuhlawu xo ya hi nghohe!
trg_text: Stop racism!

src_text: Khabinete yi sole hi matimba swiendlo hinkwaswo swa xihlawuhlawu xo ya hi nghohe etikweni, ku katsa na timhangu leti mangariweke eka Xikolo xa le Henhla xa Seminari xa Good Hope na le Yunivhesiti ya Stellenbosch eKapa-Vupeladyamb Swiendlo hinkwaswo leswo khomisa tingana swi hambana na mikhuvanene leyi nga eka vumbiwa leyi ehenhla ka yona tiko ra ka hina ra xidemokirasi ri simekiweke, leyi yi katsaka xindzhuti xa munhu, nkaxihlawuhlawu wo ya hi nghohe, nkaxihlawuhlawu wo ya hi rimbewu, vululami bya vanhu, ndzingano na nxixim
trg_text: Cabinet strongly condemned all acts of racism in the country, including the reported incidents at the Good Hope Seminary High School and the University of Stellenbosch in the Western Cap These deplorable acts go against the constitutional values on which our democratic country was founded, which include human dignity, non-racialism, non-sexism, social justice, equity and respec

src_text: Vumbiwa ra Rhiphabuliki ya Afrika-Dzonga, 1996 hi rona xiletelo xa hina eka ku herisa swiavanyiso leswo nyumisa na nkavululami wa nkarhi lowu nga hundz Vatswari va hlohloteriwa ku dyondzisa vana ku bakanya xihlawuhlawu xo ya hi nghohe na ku vukarha ku hambana, tanihi xiphemu xa pfhumba ra hina leri hlanganeriweke ku kondletela ku akiwa ka rixaka na nkhomano wa vanh
trg_text: The Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 is our guide towards eradicating the despicable divisions and injustices of the pas Parents are urged to teach children to reject racism and embrace diversity, as part of our concerted drive to promote nation-building and social cohesio

src_text: A hi tirhisaneni ku paluxa xihlawuhlawu xo ya hi nghohe kwihi kumbe kwihi laha xi khomiwaka tanihi ntolovelo na ku rhumela xihungwana lexi nga erivaleni leswaku ku hava ndhawu ya xona etikweni ra ka hina ra xidemokiras 4.
trg_text: Let us work together to expose racism wherever it is treated as the norm and send a clear message that there is no space for it in our democratic countr 4.

src_text: Vuxaka bya Afrika-Dzonga Jarimani
trg_text: Germany relations

src_text: Khabinete yi amukele Rendzo ra Ximfumo leri humeleleke hi Chanselara wa Rhiphabuliki ya Xifederali ya Jarimani, Yena Muchaviseki Olaf Scholz, eAfrika-Dzonga hi Ravumbirhi, 24 Mudyaxihi 2022.
trg_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful Official Visit by Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany, His Excellency Olaf Scholz, to South Africa on Tuesday, 24 May 2022.

src_text: Rendzo ra Ximfumo ra Chanselara Scholza ri hikwalaho ka xirhambo xa Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, loyi a rhangelaka mpfuxelelo wa mfumo ku kondletela vuxaka bya swifundza na matiko ya misava lebyinene, xikan'we na ku koka rinoko ra vuvekisi lebyi dingiwaka swonghas
trg_text: Chancellor Scholz s Official Visit was at the invitation of President Cyril Ramaphosa, who is leading the government crusade to foster good regional and international relations, as well as attract much-needed investment

src_text: Varhangeri lavambirhi, exikarhi ka swin'wana, va kanele tindlela ta ku tiyisa ntirhisano eka swiyenge swo tanihi eneji na ku cinca ka tlilayimete, mabindzu na vuvekisi, na miangulo eka COVID-19 na xilaveko xa swisawutis Va tlhele va ehleketisisa hi mayelana na leswi humelelaka eka tikokulu ra Afrika na le matikweni ya misava, ku katsa na ntlimbo eUkraine na nkhumbo wa wona ehenhla ka ikhonomi ya matiko ya misava na nsirhelelo wa swakudya na enej
trg_text: The two leaders discussed, among others, ways to enhance cooperation in areas such as energy and climate change, trade and investment, and responses to COVID-19 and vaccine deman They also reflected on developments on the African continent and internationally, including the conflict in Ukraine and its impact on the international economy and food and energy securit

src_text: Jarimani a yo va ntsena mutirhisani wo bindzurisa lonkulu wa xiyimo xa vumbirhi wa Afrika-Dzonga, kambe yi tlhela yi va xihlovo lexikulu xa xiyimo xa vunharhu xa vapfhumba va le ndzhandzheni, muvekisinkulu tlhelo mutirhisani wa nhluvukis 5.
trg_text: Germany is not only South Africa s second-largest trading partner, but it is also the third-largest source of overseas tourists, a major investor and a development partne 5.

src_text: Khomferense ya Misava Hinkwayo ya vu5 hi mayelana na ku Herisiwa ka Vatirhi lava ha riki Vana
trg_text: 5th Global Conference on the Elimination of Child Labour

src_text: Khabinete yi amukele mahetelelo lama humeleleke ya Khomferense ya Misava Hinkwayo ya vu5 hi mayelana na ku Herisiwa ka Vatirhi lava ha riki Vana leyi khomeriweke eDurban kusuka 15 kufika 20 Mudyaxihi 2022.
trg_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful conclusion of the 5th Global Conference on the Elimination of Child Labour held in Durban from 15 to 20 May 2022.

src_text: Vakhomaxiave kusuka emisaveni hinkwayo va tile eka khomferense leyi, leyi a yi khomiwile hi ku tirhisana na Nhlangano wa Vatirhi wa Matiko ya Misav
trg_text: Stakeholders from the around the world attended the conference, which was held in collaboration with the International Labour Organisatio

src_text: Endzhaku ka ku kanela maendlelo lamanene lama tirhisiwaka hi matiko yo hambanahambana na ku kuma mavangwa ya magoza ya xihatla lama dingiwaka ku hatlisisa ku herisiwa ka vatirhi lava ha riki vana na lava sindzisiwaka, va amukele 'Xikombelo xa ku Teka Goza xa Durban' ku tirhana na mpingu wa vatirhi lava ha riki van
trg_text: After discussing good practices implemented by the different countries and identifying gaps and urgent measures needed to accelerate the elimination of both child and forced labour, they adopted the

src_text: Vatirhi lava ha riki vana va yimela rixaka leri tikeriwaka kutlula mpimo na ku veka vana eka swiyimo swa khomb Swi vumba nxaniso naswona swi sivela vana ku kuma dyondzo na swivandlanene swa nhluvukiso swin'wan N'wana un'wana na un'wana eAfrika-Dzonga u na mfanelo leyi nga hambanisiwiki ya ku sirheleriwa eka maendlelo yo tirha yo xanis
trg_text: Child labour represents the worst of society and exposes children to dangerous situation It constitutes abuse and prevents children from getting an education and other developmental opportunitie Every child in South Africa has the inalienable right to be protected from exploitative labour practice

src_text: Mfanelo ya ku kuma dyondzo ya masungulo yi hlayisiwile eka Vumbiwa ra hina naswona hi ku landza Nawu wa Swikolo swa Afrika-Dzonga, 1996 (Nawu wa 84 wa 1996),
trg_text: The right to basic education is enshrined in our Constitution and in terms of the South African Schools Act, 1996 (Act 84 of 1996),

src_text: mutswari un'wana na un'wana u boheka ku endla leswaku mudyondzi un'wana na un'wana loyi a nga na vutihlamuleri bya yena a ya exikolweni kusuka eka siku ra xikolo ro sungula ra lembe leri mudyondzi yaloye a khomaka harona nkombo wa malembe hi vukhale kufikela siku ra xikolo ro hetelela ra lembe leri mudyondzi yaloye a khomaka harona 15 wa malembe hi vukhale kumbe giredi ya vukaye, xihi kumbe xihi lexi rhangaka xi humelela .
trg_text: every parent must cause every learner for whom he or she is responsible to attend a school from the first school day of the year in which such learner reaches the age of seven years until the last school day of the year in which such learner reaches the age of 15 years or the ninth grade, whichever occurs first .

src_text: Hi ku landza Nawu wa Vana, 2005 (Nawu wa 38 wa 2995),
trg_text: In terms of the Children s Act, 2005 (Act 38 of 2005),

src_text: a ku na munhu loyi a nga ha tirhisaka, a xava, a nyika kumbe a thola n'wana eka vatirhi va vana .
trg_text: no person may use, procure, offer or employ a child for child labour .

src_text: Swiboho swa Khabinete1.
trg_text: Cabinet decisions1.

src_text: Ku Fikeleriwa ka Ntwanano wa Matiko ya Misava eka Nsirhelelo wa Vanhu Hinkwavo kusuka eka ku Nyamalala loku Sindzisiweke (ICPPED)
trg_text: Accession to the International Convention for the Protection of all Persons from Enforced Disappearance (ICPPED)

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku rhumeriwa ka ICPPED ePalamente leswaku ku langutisisiwa ku fikeleriwa ka Ntwanano lowu hi Afrika-Dzong Ntwanano lowu i ntwanano lowu bohaka matiko hinkwawo wa Vun'we bya Tinxaka (UN) lowu wu tirhanaka na ku onhiwa ka timfanelo ta ximunhu hikwalaho ka ku nyamalala loku sindzisiweke ka vanh
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the ICPPED to Parliament for consideration of South Africa acceding to the conventio The convention is a universally binding treaty of the United Nations (UN) that deals with the violation of human rights through the enforced disappearance of peopl

src_text: Ntwanano lowu wu hlamusela ku nyamalala loku sindzisiweke ku katsa ku tlhakisiwa, ku khomiwa, ku pfaleriwa handle ko tengisiwa kumbe mixaka yin'wana yihi kumbe yihi leyi yi nga vangaka ku ala ka muonhi ku amukela hambi ku tumbeta ndhawu leyi muxanisiwa a nga eka yon
trg_text: The convention defines the enforced disappearance to include abduction, arrest, detention or any other forms which may result in the perpetrator s refusal to acknowledge or even conceal the whereabouts of the victi

src_text: Xikan'wekan'we loko swi pfumeleriwa etikweni ku nghena eka milawu, Afrika-Dzonga yi ta languteriwa ku vika malembe mambirhi man'wana na man'wana eka UN hi mayelana na hilaha yi humelerisaka hakona ntwanano low Ntwanano lowu wu nyika magoza yo sivela eka matiko lama nga swirho lama ma dingaka ku ma veka ku sivela ku nyamalala loku sindzisiweke ka vanhu ematikweni ya ka von 2.
trg_text: Once acceded to be domesticated into our laws, South Africa will be expected to report every two years to the UN on how it is giving effect to the conventio The convention provides preventative measures the member countries need to put in place to prevent the enforced disappearance of persons in their respective countrie 2.

src_text: Xiviko xa Tiko xa vumune xa Afrika-Dzonga hi mayelana na Nsirhelelo na Nkondletelo wa Timfanelo ta Ximunhu
trg_text: South Africa s fourth Country Report on the Protection and Promotion of Human Rights

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku rhumeriwa ka Xiviko xa Tiko xa vumune hi mayelana na Nsirhelelo na Nkondletelo wa Timfanelo ta Ximunhu eka Khansele ya Timfanelo ta Ximunhu ya Vun'we bya Tinxak Nkambisiso wa Mikarhi wa Matiko Hinkwawo wa UN wu ta kambisisa xiviko lexi endzhakunyana ka nkarhi nan'wak Kusukela loko yi ri musayini eka Ntwanano wa Timfanelo ta Ximunhu wa UN, Afrika-Dzonga yi kambisisiwile kanharhu, laha nkambisiso wo hetelela wu endliweke hi Ndzati 2012.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the fourth Country Report on the Protection and Promotion of Human Rights to the United Nations Human Rights Counci The UN Universal Periodic Review will review the report later this yea Since being a signatory to the UN Human Rights Convention, South Africa has been reviewed three times, with the last review done in September 2012.

src_text: Xiviko lexi xi nyika mpfuxeto eka 187 wa swibumabumelo leswi amukeriweke kusuka eka 2017 wa phurosese ya nkambisiso ya 2017.
trg_text: The report provides an update on the 187 accepted recommendations from the 2017 review proces Inputs were drawn from verified data, information from relevant departments, Chapter 9 institutions and relevant civil-society organisation

src_text: Mavonelo ya tekiwile kusuka eka data leyi tiyisisiweke, vuxokoxoko kusuka eka tindzawulo leti faneleke, mihlangano ya Kavanyisa ka 9 na mihlangano leyi nga na ku tsakela kun'we ya vaak
trg_text: Cabinet received the progress report on the implementation of the Framework on Gender Responsive Planning, Budgeting, Monitoring Evaluation and Audi

src_text: Khabinete yi tsakisiwile hi ndzima leyi khatsiweke eka ku tirhisa swibumabumelo nakambe na hi swiyenge leswi a swa ha ri eku yisiweni emahlwen Xiviko lexi xi ta endliwa xi kumeka eka mani na mani xikan'wekan'we loko xi ta va xi andlariwile eka UN hi Mhawuri 202
trg_text: Cabinet is pleased with the progress made in implementing the recommendations and also with those areas that are still work in progres The report will be made public once it has been tabled to the UN in August 202

src_text: Pholisi ya Malawulelo ya Mati ya Migodi ya 2022
trg_text: Mine Water Management Policy of 2022

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise Pholisi ya Malawulelo ya Mati ya Migodi ya 2022 leswaku yi tirhisiw Pholisi leyi yi nyika maendlelo ya ku sirhelela na ku hlayisa matirhiselo ya mat Yi ringanisa migingiriko ya ikhonomi ya migodi na xilerisoximfumo xa ku nyika matirhiselo ya mati lama yisekaka emahlweni ya tik
trg_text: Cabinet approved the Mine Water Management Policy of 2022 for implementatio The policy provides mechanisms to protect and conserve water usag It balances the mine economic activities with the mandate to provide sustainable water usage for the countr

src_text: Exikarhi ka miphalalo yin'wana, pholisi leyi yi veka erivaleni swiave na vutihlamuleri endzeni ka swiyenge leswinharhu swa mfumo hi mayelana na timhaka ta mati ya migod Ku cinca loku ringanyetiwaka ku ololoxa mitlhontlho ya ku tirhisa mixupulo ehenhla ka vathyakisi na ku endla swi olova ku tirhisa nawu lowu nge muthyakisi wa hakel Pholisi leyi yi hluvukisiwile hi ku fambisana na Nawu wa Mati wa Rixaka, 1988 (Nawu wa 36 wa 1998)
trg_text: Amongst other interventions, the policy clarifies the roles and responsibilities within the three spheres of government with regard to mine water issue The proposed changes will resolve the challenges of instituting sanctions on polluters and make it easy to invoke the polluter pays principl The policy is developed in line with the National Water Act, 1998 (Act 36 of 1998)

src_text: Xiviko hi mayelana na Rimba hi mayelana na Nkunguhato wo Angula swa Rimbewu, Mapimanyetelo, Nkambelo wa Vuvekatihlo na Oditi
trg_text: Report on the Framework on Gender Responsive Planning, Budgeting, Monitoring Evaluation and Audit

src_text: Khabinete yi kume xiviko ku ya emahlweni hi mayelana na ku tirhisiwa ka Rimba hi mayelana na Nkunguhato wo Angula swa Rimbewu, Mapimanyetelo, Nkambelo wa Vuvekatihlo na Odit
trg_text: Cabinet received the annual performance monitoring report for the 2021/22 report on the empowerment of women, youth and persons with disabilitie The report tracks the key indicators in the promotion of equity, level of employment and the ownership and participation of these groups in the activities of the departments and the state-owned entitie

src_text: Khabinete yi khense ndzima leyikulukumba kutlula hinkwato leyi khatsiweke hi tindzawulo ta mfumo to hlayanyana eka ku tirhisa rimba leri ri amukeriweke hi 2019 leswaku ri tirhisiw
trg_text: Cabinet appreciated the great progress made by a number of government departments in institutionalising the framework that was adopted in 2019 for implementatio

src_text: Tindzawulo to tala kutafika sweswi ti vekile swirhangana swa pholisi ku letela minongoloko ya ntolovelo ku ri karhi ku pakanisiwa vavasati, vantshwa na vanhu lava nga na vutsoniw Khabinete yi komberile vuvekatihlo byo tiya na ku nyika swiviko, ngopfungopfu hi mayelana na tin'wana ta tindzawulo leti ti nga si vikaka
trg_text: More departments have since put in place policy priorities to guide the mainstreaming programmes targeting women, youth and persons with disabilitie Cabinet has called for tighter monitoring and reporting, especially on some of the departments that have not yet reported

src_text: N'wangulano wa Vantshwa wa Nelson Mandela (NMYD)
trg_text: Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue (NMYD)

src_text: Khabinete yi pfumelele NMYD leswaku yi endleka lembe na lembe ku sungula hi 2022.
trg_text: Cabinet endorsed the NMYD to take place annually starting in 2022.

src_text: NMYD ya masungulo yi ta endleka kusuka 7 kufika 20 Mawuwana 2022.
trg_text: The inaugural NMYD will take place from 7 to 20 July 2022.

src_text: Leri i pfhumba ra Phuresidente ku nyika vantshwa va Tikokulu pulatifomo ya ku vulavurisana eka miangulano leyi akaka hi mayelana na timhaka leti ti va khumbak
trg_text: This is the Presidential initiative to afford the youth of the Continent a platform to engage in constructive dialogues on matters that affect the

src_text: Miangulano leyi
trg_text: The dialogues

src_text: leyi yi nga simekiwa ehenhla ka khale ka Phuresidente Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela loyi a xiximiwaka swonghasi
trg_text: which will be anchored on our international icon former President Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela

src_text: yi ta sungula mivulavurisano ku byala ntolovelo wa vurhangeri bya matikhomelonene eAfrik
trg_text: will start conversations to inculcate the culture of an ethical leadership in Afric

src_text: Yi ta nyika vantshwa xivandlanene ku avelana ndzhaka ya vona ya mfuwo leyo fuw Pfhumba leri ri ta tlhela ri tiyisa vuxaka bya vanhu-eka-vanhu exikarhi ka vantshwa va tikokulu ler Ndzawulo ya Vavasati, Vantshwa na Vanhu lava nga na Vutsoniwa yi ta nyika vuxokoxoko bya nongoloko wa swiendleko eka xiteji xa le ndzhakunyana
trg_text: They will afford young people an opportunity to share their rich cultural heritag The initiative will also strengthen people-to-people relations amongst the youth of the continen The Department of Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities will provide details of the programme for the events at a later stage

src_text: Xiviko xa Vuvekatihlo bya Matirhelo xa Lembe na Lembe xa 2021/22 hi mayelana na Havexerisamatimba wa Vavasati na Ndzingano wa Rimbewu, Nhluvukiso wa Vantshwa na Vanhu lava nga na Vutsoniwa
trg_text: 2021/22 Annual Performance Monitoring Report on Women Empowerment and Gender Equality, Youth Development and Promotion of the Rights of Persons with Disabilities

src_text: Khabinete yi kume xiviko xa vuvekatihlo bya matirhelo xa lembe na lembe xa xiviko xa 2021/22 xa havexerisamatimba wa vavasati, vantshwa na vanhu lava nga na vutsoniw Xiviko lexi xi landzelerisa swikombokulu eka nkondletelo wa ndzingano, levhele ya ku thoriwa na vun'wini na vutekaxiave bya mitlawa leyi eka migingiriko ya tindzawulo na mavandla lama nga ehansi ka vun'wini bya mfum
trg_text: The Minister in The Presidency for Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities will soon unpack the full programm All youth activities will be expected to comply with COVID-19 health protocols

src_text: Xiviko lexi xi ta endliwa ku ri karhi ku langutiwa rimba ra nkunguhato wo angula swa rimbewu, mapimanyetelo, vuvekatihlo, nkambelo na oditi leri ri amukeriweke hi Khabinete hi 2019.
trg_text: The report is compiled against the gender-responsive planning budgeting, monitoring, evaluation and Auditing framework which was adopted by Cabinet in 2019.

src_text: Milawumbisi1.
trg_text: Messages1.

src_text: Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Rihanyo na Vuhlayiseki bya le Migodini
trg_text: Mine Health and Safety Amendment Bill

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise nkandziyiso wa Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Rihanyo na Vuhlayiseki bya le Migodini leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonel Nawumbisi lowu wu lava ku antswisa rihanyo na vuhlayiseki bya vatirhi bya le migodini, ku katsa na mbangu lowu mitirho ya le migodini yi endlekaka eka won Nawumbisi lowu wu hundzuluxa Nawu wa Rihanyo na Vuhlayiseki bya le Migodini, 1999 (Nawu wa 29 wa 1996).
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Mine Health and Safety Amendment Bill for public comment The Bill seeks to improve the health and safety of the mine employees, including the environment in which mining operations take plac The Bill amends the current Mine Health and Safety Act, 1996 (Act 29 of 1996).

src_text: Mihundzuluxo leyi pfuxetiweke, exikarhi ka swin'wana, yi nyika mbhasiso eka yin'wana ya minongoti leyi nga eka Nawu lowu, yi tiyisa rimba ro lawula ra rihanyo na vuhlayiseki na ku ri fambelanisa na maendlelo lamanene ya matiko ya misava hi mayelana na vuhlayiseki bya le migodin 2.
trg_text: The revised amendments provide, among others, clarity on some of the concepts in the Act, strengthen the health and safety regulatory framework and align it with international best practices with regard to safety in the mine 2.

src_text: Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Vukhumenhungu wa Vumbiwa wa 2022
trg_text: The Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku kandziyisiwa ka Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Vukhumenhungu wa Vumbiwa wa 2022 leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo na leswaku Holobye wa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso, Ttn Ronald Lamola, a kota ku nyika xitiviso lexi nga na vuxokoxoko bya hundzuluxo lowu ringanyetiwaka eka Vumbiw
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 for public comments and that the Minister of Justice and Correctional Services, Mr Ronald Lamola, can give notice with particulars of the proposed amendment to the Constitutio

src_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu hundzuluxa Xiyenge xa 6(1) xa Vumbiwa ra Rhiphabuliki ya Afrika-Dzonga ra 1996, lexi xi tivisaka leswaku tindzimi ta ximfumo ta 11 ta Afrika-Dzonga i Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Xibunu, Xinghezi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa na isiZul
trg_text: The Bill amends Section 6(1) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996, which proclaims that South Africa s 11 official languages are Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa and isiZul

src_text: Hundzuluxo lowu wu tekela enhlokweni Ririmi ra Swikoweto ra Afrika-Dzonga (SL) tanihi ririmi ra ximfumo ra vu12 ra tiko naswona ri ta antswisa vuamukeleki bya rona bya mfuwo na ku tiyisisa timfanelo to ringana eka vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga hinkwavo, swi nga ri na mhaka vutsoniwa bya von Ndzawulo ya Dyondzo ya Masungulo se yi tekela enhlokweni SASL tanihi ririmi ra le kay
trg_text: The amendments will give recognition to the South African Sign Language (SL)as the 12th official language of the country and will advance its cultural acceptance and affirm equal rights for all South Africans, irrespective of their disabilitie The Department of Basic Education already recognises the SASL as a home languag

src_text: Vhiki ra Nsirhelelo wa Vana
trg_text: Child Protection Week

src_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi ta fungha Vhiki ra Nsirhelelo wa Vana ra Rixaka kusuka 29 Mudyaxihi kufika 4 Khotavuxika 2022 ehansi ka nkongomelo:
trg_text: South Africa will mark National Child Protection Week from 29 May to 4 June 2022 under the theme:

src_text: A hi Sirheleleni Vana hi nkarhi wa COVID-19 na Kuhundza .
trg_text: Let us Protect Children during COVID-19 and Beyond .

src_text: Hi nkarhi wa vhiki leri, nkongomiso wa miehleketo wo hlawuleka wu ta va eka xiphiqo xa rixaka xa vuyimana bya vakondlo-a-ndzi-dyi, leri ri voneke ku ntlakuko hi nkarhi wa COVID-19 wa vakondlo-a-ndzi-dyi lava velekeke vana hi 2023.
trg_text: During the week, special attention will be drawn to the national issue of teenage pregnancy, which saw a spike during COVID-19 of teenagers giving birth in 2023.

src_text: Khabinete yi kombele matshalatshala lama katsanisiweke kusuka eka vatswari, vaaki lava nga na ku tsakela kun'we, mitlawa ya vukhongeri na muganga hi ku angarhela ku pfuna ku cinca ku tlakuka eka vuyimana bya vakondlo-a-ndzi-dyi
trg_text: Cabinet called for a combined effort from parents, civil society, religious groupings and the community at large to help change the rise in teenage pregnancy

src_text: Foramu ya Ikhonomi ya Misava (WEF)
trg_text: World Economic Forum (WEF)

src_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi le ku tekeni ka xiave eka WEF eDavos-Klosters, Switzerland kusuka 22 kufika 26 Mudyaxihi 2022, ehansi ka nkongomelo:
trg_text: South Africa is participating in the WEF in Davos-Klosters, Switzerland from 22 to 26 May 2022, under the theme:

src_text: Ku Tirhisana, ku Vuyisa Ntshembano .
trg_text: Working Together, Restoring Trust .

src_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi veka nkoka eka xivandlanene xa ku va xiphemu xa xitshunxo na ku avelana mitokoto ya hina eka foramu ya misava hinkway Vukona bya rixaka ra ka hina eka WEF byi tlhela byi va bya nkoka swonghasi eka ku kurisa vito ra hina lerinene tanihi ndhawu ya vuvekisi ya matiko ya misava, ku avelana na misava xivono xa hina xa vumundzuku na ku kombisa leswi nga eku humeleleni leswintshwa endzeni ka tiko leri
trg_text: South Africa values the opportunity to be part of the solution and share our experiences at the global foru Our nation s presence at WEF is also critical to growing our reputation as a global investment destination, sharing with the world our vision for the future and highlighting new developments within the country

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise Nongoloko wa N'hweti ya Vantshwa wa 2022 ehansi ka nkongomelo:
trg_text: Cabinet approved the Youth Month Programme for 2022 under the theme:

src_text: Ku kondletela vutihanyisi lebyi yisekaka emahlweni na nkondzelelo wa vantshwa ku kuma vumundzuku byo antswa .
trg_text: Promoting sustainable livelihood and resilience of young people for a better tomorrow .

src_text: Siku ra Vantshwa ra ximfumo ri ta tsundzukiwa eKapa-Vupeladyamb
trg_text: The official Youth Day will be commemorated in the Eastern Cap

src_text: Lembe leri ri fungha anivhesari ya 46 ya nkitsinkitsi wa swichudeni wa 16 Khotavuxika 1976 eSoweto loko vantshwa va kombisa ku vilela ehenhla ka ku rhwexiwa ka Xibunu hi mfumo wa xihlawuhlawu tanihi ririmi ra ndzeris
trg_text: This year marks the 46th anniversary of the 16 June 1976 student uprising in Soweto when young people protested against the imposition of Afrikaans by the apartheid regime as a medium of instructio

src_text: Hi moya wa Khotavuxika 1976, Khabinete yi kombele vantshwa va rixaka ku tirhana na ntlhontlho wa ku tlakuka ka mpfumaleko wa mitirho ya vantshwa hi ku teka xiave eka minongoloko ya nhluvukiso yo tanihi vudyondzelantokoto na vutirhelantokot
trg_text: In the spirit of June 1976, Cabinet called on the nation s youth to tackle the challenge of rising youth unemployment by participating in developmental programmes such as learnerships and internship

src_text: Mfumo wu hluvukisile minongoloko ku seketela ku thoriwa ka vantshwa na ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirho ya nkarhinyan Mabindzu na wona ya khutaziwa ku nghenisa vantshwa vo tala emitirhweni hi ku tumbuluxa swivandlanene swa vantshw
trg_text: Government has developed programmes to support youth employment and the creation of short-term job Businesses are also encouraged to draw more young people into employment by creating opportunities for yout

trg_text: Condolences Cabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of: Mr Mpho Moerane (52), the former City of Johannesburg Executive Mayor, and lifelong political activist and servant of the people of Johannesbur Before being appointed Executive Mayor, he served as Member of the Mayoral Committee for Environment and Infrastructure Service Dr Deborah Fraser (56), the multi-award-winning gospel artist who was recently honoured with a Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music by the Christian Leadership AcademDr Namane Magau (70), the respected scholar and esteemed member of the South African National AIDS Council Board of TrusteeMr Mike Sch ssler (60), the renowned South African economist who was a stalwart of the industry and provided telling insights into the state of the South African economMr Jamie Bartlett (56), the acclaimed, multi-award-winning South African stage and TV actor, who was best known for his roles as Mike O'Reilly in Isidingo and David Genaro in Rhythm CitCabinet also joined President Ramaphosa in extending condolences to the government and people of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) following the passing of His Royal Highness Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), President of the UA

src_text: Leswi swi katsa phurosese ya ku hundziseriwa ka misava ya nhlanganelo kusuka eka Mfumo kuya eka vakhomatimfanelo lava faneleke, leswi swi nga swa nkoka eka havexerisamatimba wa miganga ya le matikoxikay Mpfumaleko wa vun'wini bya misava bya ximfumo eka tindhawu ta nhlanganelo a swi onhi ntsena timfanelo ta vanhu ku va na vun'wini bya misava leyi va tshamaka eka yona, kambe swi hunguta vuswikoti bya vona bya ku yi tirhisa ku antswisa vutomi bya vona hi ndlela ya ikhonom
trg_text: These include the process of transferring communal land from the State to the appropriate rights holders, which is important for the empowerment of rural communitie The lack of formal land ownership in communal areas not only dilutes the rights of people to own the land they live in but limits their abilities to use it to improve their lives economicall

src_text: Michavelelo Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va: Ttn Mpho Moerane (52), khale ka Meyarankulu wa Dorobakulu ra Joni, tlhelo mugingirikeli wa tipolitiki wa nkarhi wa vutomi tlhelo mutirhelavanhu wa Jon A nga si thoriwa tanihi meyarankulu, u tirhe tanihi Xirho xa Komiti ya Meyara ya Mbangu na Vukorhokeri bya Switirhisiwakul Dkd Deborah Fraser (56), mutshila wa vuyimbeleri bya mahungu lamanene loyi a wineke masagwati yo tala loyi a ha ku xiximiwa hi Vudokodela bya Filosofi eka Vuyimbeleri byo Kwetsima hi Christian Leadership AcademDkd Namane Magau (70), xidyondzeki lexi xiximiwaka tlhelo xirho xo xiximiwa xa Bodo ya Valawulathirasiti ya Khansele ya AIDS ya Rixaka ya Afrika-DzongTtn Mike Sch ssler (60), mutivi wa ikhonomi wa Afrika-Dzonga wo tiveka swinene loyi a tshembekile na ku tirha hi ku tikarhata naswona a nyikeke vundzeni byo pfuna swinene eka xiyimo xa ikhonomi ya Afrika-DzongTtn Jamie Bartlett (56), mutlangi wa le xitejini na le ka TV wa Afrika-Dzonga loyi a wineke masagwati yo tala, na ku xiximiwa swinene, loyi a tiveka swinene hi swiave swa yena tanihi Mike O'Reilly eka Isidingo tlhelo David Genaro eka Rhythm Cit Khabinete yi tlhele yi tikatsa na Phuresidente Ramaphosa eka ku hundzisa michavelelo eka mfumo na vanhu va United Arab Emirates (UAE) ka ku lova ka Yena Muchaviseki Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), Phuresidente wa UA
